summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Initially, there are multiple vehicles ahead, including a motorcycle and a car on the left side. As the vehicle progresses, a white car is seen parked on the right side, and a pedestrian in red clothing is standing near it. Towards the end, the road becomes clearer with fewer vehicles ahead.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed throughout the segment. It keeps a safe distance from the vehicles ahead and does not make any sudden movements or lane changes.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcycle, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward. 2) Left side: A car, approximately 15 meters away, moving forward. 3) Right side: A white car, approximately 5 meters away, parked. 4) Right side: A pedestrian in red clothing, approximately 5 meters away, standing near the white car.

summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is navigating through an urban area. The road ahead is clear, with a few vehicles parked on the right side and a motorcycle moving ahead. The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and lane position.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and lane position, ensuring safe navigation through the urban area. The driver is cautious of the parked vehicles on the right side and the motorcycle moving ahead.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcycle, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward. 2) Right: Multiple parked vehicles, approximately 3 meters away, stationary.
